programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Kardashians vs. Jordyn Woods
programme.desc: S1:E4 Jordyn Woods was somebody the Kardashian family trusted. But all that changed when rumours of her being a home wrecker emerged after a scandalous yet confusing night at a party with Khloé Kardashian’s then-boyfriend and NBA player, Tristan Thompson. Our team investigated both sides of the story and got the real truth about what happened that night.

programme.title: Anna Faris vs. Chris Pratt
programme.desc: S1:E6 If Chris Pratt didn’t have an affair with Jennifer Lawrence, why did he file for divorce From Anna Faris? Chris Pratt and Anna Faris were the famous, ideal couple the world couldn’t get enough of. But when Chris Pratt skyrocketed into superstardom, Anna felt more and more insecure. Then, rumors of Chris having an affair with co-star Jennifer Lawrence emerged. Even though they both deny having an affair, Chris and Annas sudden divorce, fallout of their personal lives, and the health of their son caused a media frenzy that our team got to the bottom of.

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Kristen Stewart vs. Robert Pattinson
programme.desc: S1:E2 Every girl wanted to be Bella Swan in the blockbuster movie, Twilight. When Kristen Stewart auditioned and got the role, she fell in love with co-star Robert Pattinson shortly after, and the world became obsessed with the new young couple. But what Kristen didn’t expect was the endless media scrutiny, paparazzi following her entire life, and the endless craze from fans. After getting caught in a shocking scandal and being villainized by the entire world. But the media got her story wrongKristen had to embrace her authenticity to have the courage to be who she truly was regardless of what the world thought. We dug into Kristen and Roberts romance to find the real life story behind the tabloids.

programme.title: Daryl Davis Did the Unthinkable
programme.desc: Daryl Davis was determined to understand why he was hated for the color of his skin. His pursuit for answers brought him face to face with the leader of the KKK. Find out how one conversation is changing history in real time.

programme.title: Vengeance For A Voiceless Child
programme.desc: 8 year old Jennifer wakes up in the middle of the night in the arms of a police officer. The man wants her to believe that she is safe, but she realizes he doesnt have a badge as he drives off to a remote area. Later that night, her kidnapper leaves her for dead in the middle of a field after brutally attacking her, and from that moment on, Jennifer vows to remember every single detail about him in order to make sure he’s caught. Her injuries leave her unable to talk, yet she still finds a way to catch him… 19 years later.

programme.title: Billy Monger: Unstoppable Teen
programme.desc: Billy Monger was on the track to becoming a child Formula 4 star. But days before his birthday, Billy suffered a horrendous crash that made headlines around the world and left him in critical condition. Can you imagine your own kid in the seat of a race car going up to 200 MPH?

programme.title: Katie Piper: Unbreakable Beauty
programme.desc: Pursuing the model lifestyle in London, Katie was used to gaining attention for her looks. But when her stalker Danny Lynch hired a hitman to attack Katie, her face was destroyed and she became completely unrecognizable. It should’ve been the end of her career dreams, but Katie’s revenge turned into an inspiring rise to fame. Now, THIS is how you make a comeback!﻿

programme.title: Christine Ha: Courage in the Kitchen
programme.desc: In this exclusive Goalcast Original, the first blind contestant and winner of MasterChef, Christine Ha, opens up about how she lost her sight and her mother at a young age. These formative experiences shaped who she is today and pushed her to never give up on her dreams and finding ways to connect with the spirit of her mother.

programme.title: Katie Piper: Unbreakable Beauty
programme.desc: Pursuing the model lifestyle in London, Katie was used to gaining attention for her looks. But when her stalker Danny Lynch hired a hitman to attack Katie, her face was destroyed and she became completely unrecognizable. It should’ve been the end of her career dreams, but Katie’s revenge turned into an inspiring rise to fame. Now, THIS is how you make a comeback!﻿

programme.title: Cynthia Vigil: Escaping The Toy-Box Killer
programme.desc: March 20th, 1999, Cynthia meets up with her friend, never expecting she is minutes away from being abducted. When she wakes up, a chilling voice speaks to her – its coming from a recording. As her tears dry up, the early memories of her tough childhood revive, and a voice in her heart tells her: escape.

programme.title: Craig Scott: A Nation's Wound
programme.desc: In this bone-chilling retelling of one of the deadliest school shootings in history, Columbine survivor Craig Scott reveals the secret left by his sister who died that day.

programme.title: Wolf of Wallstreet's Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Visionary entrepreneur Jordan "The Wolf of Wall Street" Belfort explains how his own tale of redemption can help motivate you at your darkest hour.

programme.title: Retirement Blind Spots: Avoid Sabotaging Your Financial Plan
programme.desc: On your road to retirement have you stayed too focused on just socking money away without considering blind spots that could sabotage your overall financial plan? From unexpected out-of-pocket expenses to untimely market downturns, you can lower the impact of these events by planning for them. Financial professionals Joe Anderson and Alan Clopine highlight the biggest blind spots and help you put a plan in place that can help safeguard your retirement plans.

programme.title: Early Retirement
programme.desc: According to a recent survey, 50 of us will retire earlier than expected. Often the reasons are out of our control. If you find yourself being pushed into retirement or just want to plan for the possibility of early retirement, were going to give you the tools to pivot financially so you can still thrive in retirement.

programme.title: 4 Simple Retirement Income Strategies
programme.desc: Retirement planning is essential for financial security in your golden years, and understanding different strategies is key

programme.title: Where Should I Invest After Maxing My 401k?
programme.desc: James discusses several smart savings options by walking through real-life examples of unique retirement saving goals and explaining how to allocate your funds to reach them. From investing in a brokerage account to paying down debt, there are a number of ways to continue to grow your savings even after maxing out your 401k.

programme.title: Medicare Plan N Vs Plan G? Which Should YOU Choose?
programme.desc: Curious about your Medicare options? In todays video by Marvin Musick from Medicare School, youll uncover the key differences between Medicare Plan G and Plan N. Discover the benefits of both plans that allow you to choose from a wide range of healthcare providers, eliminating the hassle of pre-authorizations and providing lifelong coverage security. Plus, both plans come with a unique foreign travel emergency benefit, giving you peace of mind even when youre abroad! Marvin dives deep into the details of the coverage nuances. Plan G steps up with comprehensive coverage, addressing five out of six Medicare gaps, including deductibles, hospital co-pays after 60 days, skilled nursing facility co-pays, and more. It even covers excess charges added by specific doctors. On the other hand, Plan N offers four out of six Medicare gaps coverage, and while it comes with some small co-pays for doctor and emergency room visits, its slightly lower premium might catch your attention.

programme.title: Social Security Changes That Could Hurt Your Finances in 2024
programme.desc: Stay ahead in 2024 with the latest Social Security updates, brought to you by Marvin Musick from Medicare School. Marvin discusses the key changes in Social Security for the year, including the new Cost of Living Adjustment (COLA) of 3.2. Wondering how this compares to last years 8.7? Marvins got you covered! This is for anyone who is looking to understand how these changes impact their financial planning. Next, Marvin shows you the critical adjustments to the earnings test limits for 2024. If youre considering taking your Social Security benefits early, youll want to pay close attention to this. Learn about the new earnings caps - $2,320 and $59,500 - and how they might affect your benefits if youre still working. Plus, Marvin discusses the increase in taxable income limits for Social Security taxes.

programme.title: Your Money Your Wealth: Re-Boot Your IRA
programme.desc: Are you neglecting one of the most precious assets that you have? When it comes to individual retirement accounts or IRAs, many people have a practice of ""fund it and forget it"". But there are strategies you can implement to help maximize the money it generates. The ""Dynamic Duo"" of financial planning, Joe Anderson, CFP, and Alan Clopine, CPA, will help you Re-Boot Your IRA

programme.title: Why Bonds in a Zero-Rate Market
programme.desc: When you first learn about investing you are told to diversity - to spread out your risk. But if you invested in bonds, certificates of deposit, or put your money in a savings accounts lately you could be losing money. Now and for recent history, the return has been near zero versus 5 historically. So you may be wondering if this advice is out-of-date? More importantly - you may be asking how do I generate income in a zero-rate market?

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

Weyakin HD
programme.desc: Join a talented and ragtag band of kayakers as they seek out the wildest whitewater in the world.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: Creekbound and Down
programme.desc: Join up-and-coming professional whitewater kayakers Knox Hammack and Trent McCrerey as they travel around the American West in search of epic whitewater and glory, hitting all the rapids they can find along the way.

programme.title: Turkey HD
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew as they travel to Turkey, home to a surprisingly robust ski culture and some unique spots to film snow sports.

programme.title: Corsica
programme.desc: Tag along as the crew hunts lines in the high alpine of the Corsican Alps. Corsica is an island in the Mediterranean known more for its beaches than for its skiing, but that won't stop TGR from finding what they're looking for.

programme.title: A World of Injustice HD
programme.desc: The link between racial inequality and the outdoors. Even though Jeremy and Selema share a passion for snowboarding, their experience with the sport has not been synonymous.

programme.title: Pathfinder
programme.desc: Life Beyond Fear. Pathfinder is a tale about the human spirit.The film follows six world-class slackliners (Highliners) on a mission deep into the Norwegian mountains to attempt something that’s never been seen before: Walking a thin line, elevated in the vastness between two colossal cliffs, illuminated only by the mystical northern lights.

programme.title: Billy the Bear
programme.desc: Anyone who's seen TGR's 2015 bike film unReal remembers the scene in which Tom Van Steenbergen is chased up a singletrack by a massive brown bear. Take a look behind the scenes at how the segment was brought to life.

programme.title: Light the Wick
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew for a look behind the scenes of Light the Wick, TGR's 2010 film. Athletes and crew alike push the limits of what's possible in the world of ski films.

programme.title: Garden Party

From essential planting tips and soil secrets to creative container gardening and vibrant floral arrangements, our seasoned instructors will guide you through every step. Whether you're a seasoned horticulturist or just starting out, you'll find fresh ideas and practical techniques to cultivate the garden of your dreams.

programme.title: Let's Play a Game
programme.desc: Whether indoors or out, games are fun! Bowl at home with family and friends with a colorful bowling set Katie makes from recycled water bottles. Franz shows how to create your own game board using a variety of art mediums. Jenny and Katie make an indoor hopscotch court that rolls-up, for easy storage. Braid a ring toss toy then use the Family Craft box to make a treasure hunt jar for quiet fun.

programme.title: Fin, Feathers and Fur
programme.desc: Let's get creative with inspiration from the forest, sea and sky. Jenny Barnett-Rohrs and Katie Hacker make a friendly hedgehog then Katie creates a wiggly fish. Franz Spohn scratches off paint to make colorful animal images and Jenny makes a gelatin print Valentine's Day card.

programme.title: Diversity in the Long Gray Line
programme.desc: Tracing the march toward a more diverse United States Military Academy, including the history of Jewish Americans and the Jewish Chapel at West Point. Produced by the West Point Jewish Chapel Fund. Also, a history of WW II's Black Devils.

programme.title: J Docs Presents The Levys of Monticello
programme.desc: The little-known story of the Levy family, who owned and preserved Monticello for 89 years, far longer than its original owner Thomas Jefferson or his descendants. Told against the backdrop of the rise of antisemitism and the legacy of slavery.

programme.title: J Docs Presents Jews of the Wild West
programme.desc: Uncovering an under-explored aspect of Jewish history: the role that Jews played in Western American expansion, both in real life and in the movies.

programme.title: The Student of Prague (1926)
programme.desc: For Balduin, going out to beer parties with his fellow students and fighting out disputes at the tip of the sword have lost their charms. He wants to find love; but how would he, a penniless student, ever dare looking up to any woman worth of loving? Absorbed in his dreary thoughts and indifferent to the advances of Lyduschka, Balduin is unexpectedly offered a fortune by the mysterious money-lender Scapinelli - but on a strange condition...

programme.title: LOVE ON A LEASH
programme.desc: A young women looking for love meets a homeless golden retriever Dog who turns into a man by night.

programme.title: THE GIRL IN THE MIRROR
programme.desc: After moving into her new off campus home and passing the inspection of her odd landlord, Alix discovers an antique mirror in her basement that contains the spirit of a dead teen that soon unleashes an onslaught of strange occurrences through out the house such as terrifying noises from behind locked doors, ghostly images, and even dead animals! With the aide of her classmates she sets out to find the secret the house holds about her and its former inhabitant, which leads her to a startling revelation that leads to mayhem and disaster.

programme.title: MISS SOUTH PACIFIC: BEAUTY AND THE SEA
programme.desc: Indigenous beauty pagent contestants from South Pacific countries challenge developed nations to reduce carbon emissions before their island homes are submerged by rising seas. Fierce, passionate, and articulate, the Queens know that climate change is an issue that cannnot be addressed by one country alone. The entire world has a responsibility to reverse the tide before Pacific Islanders are swallowed up by the sea.

programme.title: Guard Liping Conference
programme.desc: In order to study the marching direction of the Red Army, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered Sword of Xingguo to find a meeting place suitable for the Politburo to hold a safe meeting on the way. Ahead of the main force, Sword of Xingguo scouted a temporarily vacant mansion in Liping County and arranged it as the venue. The sword of Xingguo was responsible for the peripheral security mission, successfully shattered the raid plan of the enemy rangers, and ensured the smooth holding of the Politburo meeting. The resolution of the meeting changed the original plan of returning troops to western Hunan, and made a strategic decision to go north to Wu River. In early January 1935, during the Monkey Field Conference of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered Sword of Xingguo to go to the Wu River to reconnaissance and seize the ferry. Sword of Xingguo braved the severe cold and rapids to swim across the Wu River at night to investigate the enemys fortress and defense situation, and stole an enemys ferry to return. In the process, Man Zai joined the Sword of Xingguo.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 8
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 41
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. programme.title: Scenic Journey from Chennai To Leh
programme.desc: If Biking is a religion, then Leh / Ladhak is the holy place for bikers. Recently Motor Vikatan had the privilege of experiencing the thrill of riding in a Royal Enfields Himalayan through the Himalayan ghats. As a part of the Himalayan Odyssey 2019 team, we rode along with Royal Enfield customers from Chandigarh to Leh. This Part-1 is about how we started our journey from Chennai and the various safety measures we followed while riding.

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: Rainbow Show
programme.desc: Its the day of the Extreme Glow Rainbow. Zip wants to prove shes her own Smighty without her twin brother, Zap, so she grabs hold of the Air Stone which she cannot control. The Air region twists and turns and the Smighties need to be saved from the Villains trap.

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: Tarantula Twist
programme.desc: A wealthy eccentric bureaucrat from South America is saunters into the tea shop one day. Chai Raja is eager to please the bureaucrat and cordons off a VIP section for him- however such demarcations are of no consequence when Basha and Sundar are locked in a manic chase. The naughty Basha manoeuvres Sundar into crashing past the barricade and upsetting the careful setup. The blustering bureaucrat is all set to throw a fit when suddenly he sees something and shrieks in childlike delight. Its a massive spider that often lurks about the tea-shop. Fishing out a delicate collectors glass case with exotic arachnids, the foreigner eagerly points at the one missing species that he has not yet managed to bag. He wants the spider Pronto! Chai Raja orders Sundar to nab said arachnid but Sundar is frankly freaked out. He gingerly sets about his task as the bureaucrat taps manicured fingers in impatience but finds its not going to be easy as Basha just to spite Sundar has decided to team up with the Tarantula and preserve the latters freedom. The tarantula in its turn, is no pushover and proves deft and spinning inventive webs that not only trap people but bounce them off or string them up etc. The many booby traps Sundar lays all backfire and finally end in bureaucrats glass case rupturing and the collected chasing the collector. While Sundar gets his spatula dues from Chai Raja. Basha and the Tarantula hi-five- one against seven

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Cryyyy-stal
programme.desc: Its valentine day and Dunky has got a small crystal cupid as a gift for his girlfriend. He has care fully kept it on the table…

programme.title: Shivery Timbers
programme.desc: Mildred the ghost has had just about enough of the Creepy Candys noisy shenanigans and wants the library quiet.It is then the Creepy Candy find a secret treasure map and decide to follow it. The clues lead our daring swashbucklers on a high seas adventure of danger and mystery.Will they discover a hidden treasure? What will it begold, jewels, chocolate? Will Mildred ever be happy? Watch this exciting episode of Shivery Timbers and find out!

programme.title: Magic Magic
programme.desc: Cat has to find new ways of catching Keet so as he sees the snake charmer on the street he gets a idea and quietly snatches away the flute of the charmer and runs back to the house to hypnotize Cat with it.

programme.title: HOTEL CLEANI-FORNIA
programme.desc: Chai Raja wakes up one morning to find that the hotel is not yet cleaned. He yells at Sundar and the latter immediately gets to work. He cleans up and takes the trash to dump outside. While is he out, Sundar sees Basha peacefully sleeping in his hammock. Sundar dumps the trash at Bashas coconut tree and trots away with a mischievous smile. Basha wakes up with a start to the foul smell. He soon understands what happened. Now it is war! It is trash shower in hotel Kelifronia. And Chai Raja and the customers find trash everywhere they look at. A furious Chai Raja is whacking Sundar left right and centre and the poor dog is regretting his little mischief big times. Only time can say how this mess end.

programme.title: CRUNCHY SHAADI
programme.desc: A newly married couple straight from the mandap is passing by Hotel Kelifornia when the bride still in the wedding dress (with ghoonghat) smells the yummy fried murukku and the piping hot tea. She wants to try and her young and chivalrous husband would give his beautiful wife anything she wants. The couple comes in and the husband is all grandiose personified to impress his wife. Sundar is all ready to please them. And our little Basha finds this the right opportunity to grab the crispy murukkus. He makes sure that none of the food which Sundar carries, goes to the couple. And Basha comes up with crazy ways including disguising as the groom (with sehera) to grab and eat the food from the brides plate before she could even smell them. The bride is angered by the groom who is incapable of feeding her. The poor groom is trying everything possible to win the heart of his young wife. It is madness inside the hotel and Sundar is going nuts. At last the bride is fed up. She whacks the hell out of the useless groom. Basha now changes his plan and does things in such a way that the groom thinks that Sundar has been messing with him. The groom is furious and exposes Sundar to his bride and then throws him away. Then the chivalrous groom takes a huge plate full of snacks and offers it to his wife. Awww it is love all over again!! And the couple walk away in full on romance. With a crying Sundar looking at them. Basha is chewing the fag end of the yummy kacha-kela-bhajiya!

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: COMMANDO KAPPA
programme.desc: Chai Raja cycles in with a fresh batch of bananas when heavy army boots crunch in stomping at the door of the hotel. Chai Raja looks up and is not one jot happy to see his bossy estranged uncle Commando Kappa. Commando Kappa is a bossy man who wants to take over the hotel from Chai Raja and is zany enough to try any underhanded trick . Sundar senses this animosity and wants Kappa out of the shop but 6 and a half foot , Arnold like built Commando Kappa is a tough man to cross. Because he is no great cook, Kappa uses his army tactics to sabotage and tries messing up Chai Rajas ingredients- he switches the ingredients for the tea, Chai Raja knives suddenly go missing etc- Chai Raja however is quick at adapting and when knives go missing he merely uses his moustache to chop the bananas! Sunder too does his best to foil Kappa. and save Chai Raja- like when Kappa accidentally spills oil intending to slip up Chai Raja, Sundar rather himself skid in and break his own bones just so Chai Raja doesnt step into the oil or guzzle up all the chilli-spiced tea (thanks to Kappa dropping chilli powder into the brew on the sly) before Chai Raja serves it to customers and loses his reputation. However the curious Basha keeps poking his naughty nose in and its difficult for Sundar to keep up with Kappas ploys. Kappa tries to finally seize up the flexible Chai Raja, by offering a tampered herbal oil to limber him up (the oil actually stiffens whatever it is poured on- can demonstrate the effect when Kappa does a test on a small sapling on the sill). But just then Sundar and Basha tumble in as part of their chase and the oil flies landing on Kappa gets all seized up and stiff. The cricked Kappa gives up and is shown the door and Basha gives him a 21- banana peel sendoff. But Sundar has no time to rejoice for Basha is again sneaking up to the fries and must be stopped.

programme.title: Space-whale
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: TRUNK CALL
programme.desc: Its a festival day and one of Chai Rajas customers has brought in a giant tusker who he parks outside the stall. But it is at the very same time that Sundar and Basha are steeped in a blind chase- a pan comes flying and knocks the customer out. As others carry him off for some first aid, Chai Raja entrusts the elephant in Sundars care. Sundar is intimidated by the animal has no choice but to accept. Inquisitive Basha meanwhile discovers that the tusker is in fact nothing but a gentle giant Basha strikes a plan to use Sundars fear of the animal to lay hands on extra banana-fries. As Sundarworks , he spots the tuskers trunk snake in and suck in banana fritters. He jumps to confront the animal but comes up nose against the pointed tusks. And so the fritters keep disappearing, until Sundar spots Basha hi-fiving the tusker. Furious, Sundar decides to teach the both of them a lesson and rigs a watery trap to drench Basha and the tusker, but the trap malfunctions and it all ends in the massive tusker, sliding behind first ramming into the stall and the tea shop board reads Hotel Cali Torn- Ia!

programme.title: Zoonicorns in the Zooniverse
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: HOLI RE HOLI!!!
programme.desc: It is holi and Basha is in the mood to have some colourful fun. He comes in style to hotel Kelifornia with gulaal and pichkaris and literally baths the customers in colours. Sundar is having a crazy time trying to save the customers. And in that process he literally turns into a colourful canine himself. But things take a shocking turn when Basha targets Chai Raja in his holi attack. A shock-stricken Sundar takes out all his non-existent bravado to save an oblivious Chai Raja and doing that Sundar himself unexpectedly falls onto Chai Raja bathing him in gulaal! When everyone stares in silent shock, Chai Raja surprises all by happily bathing Sundar in gulaal! And it is officially holi!!!

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: Pizza Mania
programme.desc: Dunky has made pizza and gives one slice to each of them. Cat likes the pizza so much that he do not want to share the balance pizza with Keet.

programme.title: SPLIT PERSONALITY
programme.desc: A fresh morning in Hotel Kelifornia sees a cheeky Basha stealing a plate full of aaloo bonda and an angry Sundar chasing him out of the shop. The chase leads them to a coconut tree and Basha starts to throw coconuts at Sundar. One of the coconuts misses the target and bounces back hitting Basha on his head. The next moment Bashas whole attitude changes and he becomes a meek and obedient slave to Sundar. Sundar is inexplicably delighted at the exciting turn of events and he put Basha to hard labour in the shop. He is serving, cleaning, pressing Sundars legs, fanning for him and so on. Now Sundar is enjoying his life. But he still has to act all hard working in front of Chai Raja. During one of such charades a steel tumbler falls on Bashas head bringing him back to his real self. An unaware Sundar bosses around soon realizing that his good times have ended. Basha sees so much cleaning and rearranging done in the shop and he himself is too tired. Putting two and two together, it is payback time. And Sundar pays everything back..with interest.

programme.title: Holiday Resort
programme.desc: Don and colonel are about to start their wonderful holiday in an elite resort. Instead, they don’t even spend a single peaceful second in the place. Thanks to the mad rats! At last when the dogs leave the resort, they plan a nasty trap for the rats. But the rats are too smarttt…..

programme.title: Shopping Mad
programme.desc: Its shopping time! Don and Colonel move the trolley up the aisles, little do they know that the three mice are peeping from between Don’s bag. Chaos unfolds in the mall!

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: The very good witch
programme.desc: The twins meet a little witch who has no friends because everyone is afraid of her.

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Old Luggage
programme.desc: Packed with fun DIYs, Hepi and Briko tak us on an adventure!

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: A Lucky Accident
programme.desc: Maple accidentally breaks Pancake’s favorite toy, and he blows up at her. Pancake gains a different perspective about his reaction when, in the Zooniverse, he accidentally breaks a gigantic weather making machine, creating an assortment of weird weather conditions that threaten the Zooniverse. Be slow to lay blame when accidents happen; and resilient in solving the problems when they do.

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: A kind boy GoGo finds a bean seed and grows it, which sprouts all the way into the clouds. GoGo climbs the plant and finds the Giants castle above the clouds.

programme.title: Prima donna
programme.desc: The twins help a girl become a movie star, but she becomes a primadonna.

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: Distemper Tantrum
programme.desc: Maple has difficulty learning to float in the Zooniverse. Be persistent and you can learn to stay calm by thinking happy thoughts.

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: The Note
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: Take A Dance On Me
programme.desc: Pancake is terrible dancer, and when he joins the Zoonicorns in their dances to make flowers bloom, his issues could disrupt springtime. You dont have to be perfect at something to enjoy it.Feelings are as important as skills.

programme.title: Tiggy’s Big Feast
programme.desc: Tiggy is all flustered and confused as he’s not prepared, nor has any idea what to make for a surprise lunch he promised Mayor De Pfeffel. Seems Deedee’s magic is the only answer. The spell she conjures makes Tiggy be totally decided on the recipe that he sees first. And when the spell is cast, the recipe book opens up exactly at the recipe of a pie made of Tika Pila flowers. The problem is that only the Doobydoos can pick the Tika Pila flowers as it grows in the most prickly cacti in Abra-Dabra! But no matter how much Deedee and Nino coax Tiggy to work on another recipe; Tiggy is totally fixated on the Tika Pila flower pie. Though the Doobydoos love eating the flowers, they are too scared of the loud and angry Tika Pila monster that guards them and rush off in a hurry. They finally hit a bargain with Tiggy in exchange for a hundred custard sandwiches. Only with much reassuring and coaxing they pick every Tika Pila flower around. Mayor De Pfeffel is already at Tiggy’s and really hungry. But one Doobydoo is too ambitious and stays back to pick the last Tika Pila flower, but that awakes the Tika Pila monster and he shouts the biggest shout ever, scaring Tiggy and making the pie fly up high and splatter down on his face! The inevitable terrible has happened and there is nothing to give the Mayor. Just then when things couldn’t get any worse Mayor De Pfeffel lunges inside and is happy to see a whole plate of his favourite custard sandwiches.

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: The hidden champion
programme.desc: Ragoo brings in a small seashell necklace and the twins find themselves under the sea, where they meet Finny, a little fish whos too shy to play with the other fish.

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: The Lightning Strikes
programme.desc: Its raining heavily and the three are nicely tucked in the sofa and watching a tv show as the tv goes out.

programme.title: The Big Picture
programme.desc: Mort snaps a picture of Brains fighting Aphrodite, a glamorous alien woman. After Mr. Fractal confiscates Mort’s camera phone, Mort and Fred compete to get it back.

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: All Aboard
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Afternoon Off
programme.desc: To prove to Brains he can go one day without Friday, Fred agrees to a day without him, picking a day he ends up desperately needing him.

programme.title: School For Princesses – Snow White Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of SNOW WHITE, to the home of the seven DWARVES, having been called out by one of these, GRUMPY. When the DWARVES returned from work, they found that SNOW WHITE was not there and there was an opened letter lying on the table. The letter invites SNOW WHITE to enrol at a prestigious school for princesses. SANDRA soon discovers that the letter is the work of the STEPMOTHER and she and FO go to the boarding school, where all the PRINCESSES in the land of fairytales are now living. The STEPMOTHER, who is the headmistress of the school, is jealous of their beauty and has terrible plans for all of them. With their usual ingenuity and a great deal of humour, however, SANDRA and FO will prevent her from putting them into action.

programme.title: Tika Pila Thriller
programme.desc: Bella the mouse is trying hard to balance a huge pile of books just when Mewmew zooms by making Bella trip on a pebble. So she continues walking forward in reverse mode. She is so engrossed in her new walking mode that she bumps into Deedee making her books fall all over the place. On Deedee’s query as to what new learning Bella was into, they start discussing about Tika Pila and their joined curiosity to know more about the secretive creature by asking everybody in Abra-Dabra what they know about Tika Pila. Charlie seems to know a little, but the Doobydoos are too scared to even speak about her. But Bella is determined to know all she can about Tika Pila and sets off all geared for the expedition. She is scared out of her wits by the sudden and loud hooting of Tika Pila she runs for her life and slips to a halt right in front of Deedee and Nino. Almost when Bella is about to give up her Tika Pila discovery project, Deedee encourages her by helping Bella with some magic. Deedee casts a spell to help Bella get close enough to study Tika Pila. Strengthened by the spell, Bella gives one more try. Deedee and friends soon spot Tika Pila at town-hall. But as they admire how wonderful Tika Pila looks as she eats cacti flowers they hear her hoot very differently. Bella opines that the hoots are successively different because Tika Pila wants to go back home. Just then the Doodbydoos pass by and Tika Pila follows them. Deedee comes up with a plan to lure Tika Pila back to her home by getting the Doobydoos to follow Mayor De Pfeffle holding out a plate stacked with their favourite custard sandwiches. Deedee and Bella lay cacti flowers as well for Tika Pila to follow. On seeing the wide open cacti fields Tika Pila gives a loud and happy toot and makes a run for it. Bella is so happy that she decides that something as wonderful, mystical and magical as Tika Pila shouldn’t be studied.

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: Scary Face
programme.desc: Pancake over-teases Maple with his new “scary face,” then gets a taste of his own medicine in the Zooniverse when, as the old saying goes, his face freezes that way. Just because you think something is fun or funny doesn’t mean everybody else is having the same good time you are.

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Corky’s Prince
programme.desc: Corky discovers an alien frog who transforms into a handsome boy who is in love with her.

programme.title: A Star Is Jumped
programme.desc: Odessa learns to leap over stars by starting on low ones,Persistence pays off, especially when you learn from each step along the way, building up to the final goal.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: The Lost Lagoon
programme.desc: After spilling juice on mom’s blanket and not fessing up, Odessa feels guilty. In the Zooniverse, she offers to lead her friends to a lagoon to watch a butterfly dance but doesnt speak up when she loses the map. Never give up, try your hardest, and always tell the truth!

programme.title: Bird House
programme.desc: Dunky has just finished making a nice bird house for the new pigeon family and their new babies. The new family is grateful and Keet is their chosen godmother.

programme.title: Train Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is in for a calm and peaceful train journey. And then the hilarious pests enter the scene. The trio is having a time of their life; but at the cost of Don and Colonel. Their train journey is a colossal disaster. But, would the rats get away with it?? He he hell no!

programme.title: Even More Difficult – The Beauty & The Best
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the tale of Beauty and the Beast, having been called out by BEAUTY. The BEAST has mysteriously disappeared, just when she had come to love him. The Detective and her assistant must find him before the magic rose in the garden loses its last petal.

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: Poder De La flor
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: Small Fry-1939
programme.desc: Junior wants to be a Big Fry, but learns the hard way that he just isn't ready for smoking in the pool room when he should be in the school room.

programme.title: Space Thunder Kids 1991
programme.desc: Three children pilots fight against the Dark Empire on their mission to destroy the universe.

programme.title: popeye meets ali babas forty thieves
You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940
programme.desc: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them

programme.title: Plane Dumb-1932
programme.desc: After crash landing in Africa, Tom and Jerry masquerade as Africans in a futile attempt to adapt to a strange environment.

programme.title: Felix the Ghost Breaker-1923
programme.desc: Felix is trying to get some sleep in a graveyard, but keeps getting bothered by a ghost. He follows the ghost to the house of an old farmer, and the ghost proceeds to terrorize the old man, and when the farmer calls for help from the police, the ghost terrorizes them, too. Felix, however, suspects something fishy is going on, and with the help of the farmer's donkey, gets to the bottom of things.

programme.title: Land of the Lost Jewels 1950
programme.desc: Two children are fishing when they catch a talking fish named Red Lantern. He takes them underwater with him to the Land of the Lost, where missing items can be found again. They meet King Find All, a walrus, and a singing cricket (Hoppy-Go-Lucky) that used to be the girl's pin. He's deemed to be a special jewel (since he's made of emerald) and is brought to the jewel storage room, despite his wishes to be in the Land of the Toys. He runs away from Queen Tiara's guards, but is caught, and when they test him for authenticity they find he is only a fake diamond, after which he is allowed to live in the Land of the Toys after all. The children return to the surface and say goodbye to Red Lantern.

programme.title: Ride Him, Bosko -1931
programme.desc: BosKo in the Wild West, tries to have fun with any situation that come in his way.

programme.title: Popeye's 20th Anniversary 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films, in a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', Bing Crosby, 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, he instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto.

programme.title: Goo Goo Goliath 1954
programme.desc: An inebriated stork must deliver a baby to a giant at the top of a beanstalk, but doesn't feel like flying that high and instead delivers the baby to a normal-sized couple, who try to raise the giant tot as their own.

programme.title: popeye meets ali babas forty thieves
The Lucy Show 1966; Season 5; Episode 10; Lucy and John Wayne
programme.desc: Mr Mooney sends Lucy to deliver some papers pertaining to the financing of John Wayne's latest production. Despite his orders to drop off the papers with one of the studio's secretaries, Lucy insists on meeting Mr. Wayne in person at lunch and spills ketchup all over him. She then trails him to his movie set and causes all sorts of havoc.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963: Season 3; Episode 28; The Rival
programme.desc: When Opie's efforts fail to attract classmate Karen's personal interest, Thelma Lou steps in to boost Opie's confidence but destroys Barney's along the way. Can Andy realign this skewed love quadrangle?

programme.title: Half Shot at Sunrise1930
programme.desc: The stage stars Wheeler and Woolsey play two soldiers who go absent without leave in Paris, during World War I.

programme.title: The Rounders-1914
programme.desc: Two drunks live in the same hotel. One beats his wife, the other is beaten by his. They go off and get drunk together. They try to sleep in a restaurant using tables as beds and are thrown out. They lie down in a rowboat which fills with water, drowning them--a fate apparently better than going home to their wives.

programme.title: Our Gang Follies of 1938
programme.desc: The gang is putting on a show with Alfalfa billed as "King of the Crooners." But Alfalfa abandons the show saying his crooning days are over, and that opera is his true calling. But after taking a nap and dreaming of a successful future in popular music, he changes his mind and joins the rest of the gang for the closing number

programme.title: Yes, Yes, Nanette 1925
programme.desc: Nanette sends a letter to her family telling of her new husband, Hillory. When Hillory arrives to meet the family, he gets insulted by each member, including the dog, and loses his wig. After having dinner with the family, Nanette's former lover returns, and Hillory must confront him.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963; Season 3; Episode 27;Barney's First Car
programme.desc: It's a red-letter day in Mayberry when Barney decides to join the motoring world, but things go sour when his cream-puff turns out to be a lemon.

programme.title: Meet John Doe- 1941
programme.desc: A penniless drifter (Gary Cooper) is recruited by an ambitious columnist (Barbara Stanwyck) to impersonate a non-existent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a social movement begins.

Buffalo Bill, Jr. S1E5 The Black Ghost
programme.desc: Buffalo Bill Jr. tries to capture the Black Ghost, a masked outlaw trying to grab the land of a prosperous rancher. Bill falls for the rancher's pretty niece who is in cahoots with the villain. Fortunately, Calamity's feminine instincts cause her to distrust the woman and she follows her to the outlaws' hideout

programme.title: Buffalo Bill, Jr.S1E7 Boomer's Blunder
programme.desc: Buffalo Bill Jr. tries to discover why Caleb Boomer is so desperate to buy back 80 acres of land he sold to Judge Wiley.

programme.title: Old West tv social media promo
Born to Battle -1935
programme.desc: Good-natured troublemaker "Cyclone" Tom Saunders is hired by a ranchers' association manager to investigate recent cattle rustling at one of their ranches and to see if a pair of nesters have anything to do with it. After discovering the nesters, pretty Betty Powell and her rickety old father, are incapable of rustling, Tom instead turns his attention to the huge, swaggering bully of a foreman, Nate Lenox.

programme.title: Blazing Frontier 1943
programme.desc: In the 19th and last of the PRC "Billy the Kid" series (first six with Bob Steele and last 13 with Buster Crabbe), a feud develops between the settlers and the railroad detectives in Red Rock Valley. Clem Barstow sends for Billy the Kid and Fuzzy Jones to help. Buster suspects that Ward Tragg, chief of the railroad detectives, and Luther Sharp, land agent for the Western Railroad Company, are defrauding the settlers without the knowledge or sanction of the company. Billy and the settlers rustle off cattle, which have been illegally confiscated by Tragg and his men, in order to raise money for Barstow to bid on a ranch which Sharp is illegally auctioning off. Billy discovers that the purchase price on the deed has been altered and Barstow writes the company to send a man to investigate. When Tragg learns about this, he makes plans to kidnap the railroad official.

programme.title: buffalo . bill, jr s1e8 the rain wagon
Bat Masterson: S1E5 The Fighter
programme.desc: Bat wins the contract of a young fighter from his unscrupulous manager, then trains him for one honest fight, betting all his poker winnings on it. The boxer's former manager doesn't want a fair fight and plans to ensure the boxer loses

programme.title: When God Gets Ready
programme.desc: People label, but God names. You don’t have to chase identity or earn worth, because you’ve always been called, loved, and set apart for something more.

programme.title: When God Says Let Go
programme.desc: Is your faith being tested? If you’ve been waiting on the details of what God has next, remember that God doesn’t give a test without a lesson first, so if He’s calling you to let go of something, you can trust He’s already provided you with what you’ll need to take that step.

programme.title: Follow The Evidence
programme.desc: What you’re going through will not define you. When doubt tries to distort your perspective, follow the evidence that says you’re seen, chosen, and still a part of God’s plan.

programme.title: This Might Be My God Moment
programme.desc: Are you standing over a situation that’s too big for you? If you feel like your hope, logic, and options are at a dead end, pay attention because this might be your “my God moment.”

programme.title: The God Of Also
programme.desc: Don’t limit your potential. In “The God Of Also,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that understanding the calling God has placed on our lives also requires us to let go of the limited idea of who we believe He’s created us to be.
